item.title: 自 1789 年美国参议院成立以来，已有 2000 多人在参议院任职。但只有 12 人是黑人，只有 3 人是黑人女性，而且他们从未一起担任过参议员。
item.description:
More than 2,000 people have served in the U.S. Senate since it was established in 1789. But just 12 have been Black -- and only three have been Black women, none of whom have ever served together.

That could soon change. https://t.co/Wr6Bb7bOU2

— ABC News (@ABC) February 25, 2024

item.title: 尽管多年来一直在使用该技术，但到 2023 年底，美国 48.9 万辆校车中只有不到百分之一是电动的。
item.description:
Despite the availability of the technology all these years, fewer than one percent of the 489,000 school buses in the U.S. were electric at the end of 2023. https://t.co/FzJdPXgURK

— ABC News (@ABC) February 25, 2024

item.title: "每一次损失对我们来说都是巨大的牺牲"。乌克兰总统泽连斯基说，自俄罗斯发动全面入侵以来的两年中，已有3.1万名乌克兰士兵阵亡。
item.description:
"Each of these losses is a great sacrifice for us." Ukrainian Pres. Zelenskyy said that 31,000 Ukrainian soldiers have been killed in action in the two years since Russia launched its full-scale invasion. https://t.co/6Bz32aKvl9

— ABC News (@ABC) February 25, 2024

item.title: 参议员塔米-达克沃斯（Tammy Duckworth）说 在阿拉巴马州最高法院就胚胎问题做出裁决后 共和党人并没有就她提出的保护试管婴儿法案与她联系"自从阿拉巴马州的裁决后，就一直是蛐蛐在叫"。

item.title: 阳光照射下的瀑布在优胜美地国家公园形成了视觉上的 "火瀑"。夕阳西下时，"火瀑 "现象就会出现，它以合适的角度照射到马尾瀑布上，形成熔岩般的溪流幻觉。
item.description:
A waterfall illuminated by the sun created a visual “firefall" in Yosemite National Park. The "firefall" phenomenon happens when the sun sets and hits Horsetail Fall at the right angle, creating the illusion of a lava-like stream. https://t.co/RXiu4ZesC3 pic.twitter.com/FMeHLFq60o

— ABC News (@ABC) February 25, 2024

item.title: 一项新的研究不仅证实了定期进行体育锻炼可以延长人的寿命和降低死亡风险的已知研究，而且还发现，在运动量较低的情况下，女性从运动中获得的益处比男性更大。
item.description:
A new study not only confirms known research that regular physical activity can prolong life and lower a person's risk of dying, it also finds that women experience greater benefits from exercise than men do, at lower amounts of exercise. https://t.co/P0aRkeq5LG

— ABC News (@ABC) February 25, 2024

item.title: 一项关于须鲸如何在水下歌唱的发现，让科学家们更好地了解了航运活动产生的噪声污染如何改变海洋哺乳动物的交流能力--并因此促进其作为一个物种的繁荣。
item.description:
